Class MessageSearches

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Long>

    public class MessageSearches
extends Object
implements Iterable<Long>
    Uility methods to help perform search operations.

        public static boolean isMatch(SearchQuery query,
              Message<?> message,
              org.slf4j.Logger log)
                       throws MailboxException
        Does the row match the given criteria?
        Parameters:
        query - SearchQuery, not null
        message - Message, not null
        log - the logger to use
        Returns:
        true if the row matches the given criteria, false otherwise
        Throws:
        MailboxException

                       throws MailboxException
        Does the row match the given criterion?
        Parameters:
        criterion - the criterion to use
        message - Message, not null
        recentMessageUids - collection of recent message uids
        log - the logger to use
        Returns:
        true if the row matches the given criterion, false otherwise
